mapper.select: SELECT d.project_name AS projectName, d.repo_name AS repoName, d.owner_username AS ownerUsername, LISTAGG(e.ename, ', ') AS memberNames, d.current_stage AS currentStage FROM dev_repo d JOIN project_member p ON d.id = p.dev_repo_id join users u ON p.user_id = u.id JOIN emp e ON u.empno = e.empno GROUP BY d.project_name, d.repo_name, d.owner_username, d.current_stage OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY

SELECT d.project_name AS projectName, d.repo_name AS repoName, d.owner_username AS ownerUsername, LISTAGG(e.ename, ', ') AS memberNames, d.current_stage AS currentStage FROM dev_repo d JOIN project_member p ON d.id = p.dev_repo_id join users u ON p.user_id = u.id JOIN emp e ON u.empno = e.empno WHERE d.project_name LIKE '%' || #{project_name} ||'%' GROUP BY d.project_name, d.repo_name, d.owner_username, d.current_stage
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT d.id) FROM dev_repo d JOIN project_member p ON d.id = p.dev_repo_id join users u ON p.user_id = u.id JOIN emp e ON u.empno = e.empno
